Class InBuffer

java.lang.Object

public class InBuffer
extends Buffer

Reads data from a network input stream.

Thomas Nappo

                byte[] payload,
                boolean bare,
                Buffer.Type type)
Constructs a new InBuffer.

Parameters:
opCode - The operation code of the data buffer.
payload - Control information data which is contained.
bare - Whether or not this buffer contains the standard header.
type - The type-size of the InBuffer.
